com.tabuto.jsimlife
Class JSLStatistic

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      com.tabuto.jsimlife.JSLStatistic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
public class JSLStatistic
extends java.util.TimerTask
implements java.util.Observer

This Class encapsulate JSimLife model class to set some game statistic into some array and JTable

Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
TimerTask, JTable

update

public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
This is an Observer class Observe the JLife Game2D Class. WHen JLife class change his "count" notify it to all its observer. JLifeStatistic simply recalculate its statistical data recalling the CalculateStatistic Methods

Specified by:
update in interface java.util.Observer
